title: Pirate Passions
description: Stormy Adventures on the High Seas Plymouth, 1586: After his parents' untimely death, Tom is sent by his uncle on a long sea journey. He's soon inducted into the erotic rituals of the men of the British fleet. When pirates attack the ship, Tom is taken captive - only to learn that pirates, too, have their masculine rituals. Tom becomes a brother in the band of pirates, but there's something that keeps him yearning for the boys in His Majesty's service
author: Robert Bringston
